name: Shadow Government Simulator Kickstarter Demo
description:
Become the Illuminati and conquer the world one nation at a time via bribery, seduction and intimidation. Infiltrate nations, discover the who holds power and reshape their social network it to fit your agenda.

The kickstarter is live!

 Click here to check out the kickstarter!

Turn-based strategic infiltration.

Enter nations and discover who wields power in them. Uncover their traits and personalities to find the best way to convert them to your side.

Reshape Society

Discover the procedurally generated networks that hold society together. Cut and create connections between the influential in order to mold it to your vision.

Evolve your organization

Adapt your converts and your organization, unlocking new traits and abilities to better fit your grand plan.

Fight for global supremacy

Face off against the world's powers and rival nations as you play chess for domination. Captured nations become yours to command, different nations come with different abilities, but also different challenges to overcome.

Available for Mac and Windows-64!

Development

Puppet Master is made just by myself. This demo is just a small fraction of the awesome features and mechanics I want to add, but to do so I need your help. That's why there's a kickstarter going on! Please consider supporting and sharing it. Together we can take over the world! ;)

Kickstarter — https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/chupacabrags/puppet-master-the-shadow-gover...
